entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
